text: The Gönc District (Hungarian: Gönci járás) is a district in the northen part of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County. Gönc is also the name of the town where the district seat is found. Its population in 2022 was 15,665. == Municipalities == The district has 2 towns and 30 villages. * Abaújalpár * Abaújkér * Abaújszántó * Abaújvár * Arka * Baskó * Boldogkőújfalu * Boldogkőváralja * Felsődobsza * Fony * Gibárt * Golop * Gönc – district seat * Göncruszka * Hejce * Hernádbűd * Hernádcéce * Hernádszurdok * Hidasnémeti * Kéked * Korlát * Mogyoróska * Pányok * Pere * Regéc * Sima * Tállya * Telkibánya * Tornyosnémeti * Vilmány * Vizsoly * Zsujta The bolded municipalities are cities.
title: Gönc District
